document.full_text: authorities in saudi arabia have detained two shi'ite bloggers this week for taking part in demonstrations in the country's oil-producing eastern province, a shi'ite website and activists said on wednesday.
document.title: saudi arabia detains bloggers over protest: activists
lines_and_colors: authorities in saudi arabia have detained two shi'ite bloggers this week for taking part in demonstrations in the country's oil-producing eastern province, a shi'ite website and activists said on wednesday.
